title: TACS
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: tacs
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $11.8M
  in 2018-2019 on contracts with TACS. The average
  contract duration was 0.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $309.5K. The longest
  contract was 0.23 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.6M.
lookup_name: 'TACS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '11.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2018-2019'
s431_number_of_contracts: '32'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '16%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '9%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '226.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '309.5K'
s425_max_duration: '0.23'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.6M'
---
